; DO NOT EDIT THE LINE ABOVE - IT IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY CM

; This file contains host names that will be used by TaskDL to create IDL workers.
;
; File format:
;   
;  1. Each line contains one name of the slave node in the cluster.
;  2. Lines that start with semi-colon are ignored. 
;  3. Leading and trailing spaces in lines containing names are ignored.
;
; Note(s):
;
;  1. The order of the names is the order of creation of the IDL workers.
;  2. If a particular slave node is down, the name can be removed from this file. 
;     or moved to the end of the list and change the variable NUM_SLAVE_NODES
;     to only include so many names.

host1
host2
host3
host4
host5
host6

; end of file marker
